title: Weird graphic bug on PBE
body:
I was playing a game as Velkoz on the PBE and I had 2 graphical issues. One involved the auto attack animation not playing during my 2nd and 3rd attack, he would just sit there and the lasers would fire. The second is after i used my W ( the void rift ) Velkoz would suddenly freeze mid movement and be stretched straight out into a strange looking triangle.
 Note: I was using the Arch light skin

<PS> I have a image of the 2nd bug but i dont know how to add it to this post

Basebrat1

replies.body:
Hey Basebrat,

Thanks for the report! 

If you'd like to upload the images, you can first upload the image to a site like imgur.com and then just copy/paste the image link into your post or reply. :] 

In the future, please report bugs occurring on the PBE on the [PBE Report a Bug](http://pbr.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/pbe/en_BE/bugReport/create) section so we can better track issues occurring on PBE versus live. Thanks! ^-^
